Module Simulator
Package kin.dirkin

Class DirectModelKinematics

java.lang.Object
kin.dirkin.DirectModelKinematics
All Implemented Interfaces:
DirectKinematics
public class DirectModelKinematics
extends java.lang.Object
implements DirectKinematics
Provides direct kinmatics computation. The respective geometric model is taken from the simulation model.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface robotinterface.dirkin.DirectKinematics

    REFERENCE_BODYLOCAL, REFERENCE_WORLD
